title: Slots in the MSE object
weight: 1
---

```{r,include=FALSE}
library(openMSE)
```

The `MSE` object has `r length(slotNames('MSE'))` slots. As it is an [S4 object](/faq/#what-are-s4-objects?) the slots are accessed with the `@` symbol, e.g., `MSE@Name`.

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:nrow(MSEDescription)) {
  slot <- MSEDescription[i,1]
  desc <- MSEDescription[i,2]
  if (nchar(slot)>0) {
    cat("###", slot, '\n\n')
  }
  cat(desc, '\n\n')
}

```
